item.source: What is your opinion on George W. Bush?

item.title: What is your opinion on George W. Bush?
item.dc:creator: @Ron Ron
item.description:
@Ron wrote:

If a republican was to be elected in 2008, the little respect I have for the US would diminish and I don’t think I would be the only one.

[quote=“Weibs, post:26, topic:19192”]Alright, so Bush isn’t a great president, he’s probably better then Kerry would’ve been. I mean, Kerry’s little plan to get drugs from Canada ( Who, by the way, get drugs from the U.S. ) would completely mess up the pharmaceutical business, which would especially suck for my family. He thought we could get it cheaper from Canada, but if we did that, then our pharmaceutical businesses would raise the prices when selling to Canada which would raise the prices of Canada selling back to us which would be ridiculous!

If I had to choose between re-electing Bush or electing Kerry, I’d vote Bush. The only reason so many people hate him is from the stories and editorials you hear on the news or read in the newspaper.

I don’t have many facts or anything to back up my story, but common, would you rather have Kerry as president?[/quote]

I admit that I didn’t agree with everything Kerry said, but I would rather have him as our president than a fascist traitor who’s grandfather supplied the Nazis in World War 2. If you don’t believe that, look up the history of the the Bush family. His grandfather was a merchant of war and I wouldn’t be surprised if he was a Nazi too.

So yes I would rather have Kerry as our president. Hell, I would rather have a chipmunk as our president. A chipmunk could do a better job than that dick head Bush.

Read full topic
item.source: What is your opinion on George W. Bush?

item.title: What is your opinion on George W. Bush?
item.dc:creator: @Weibs Weibs
item.description:
@Weibs wrote:

Alright, so Bush isn’t a great president, he’s probably better then Kerry would’ve been. I mean, Kerry’s little plan to get drugs from Canada ( Who, by the way, get drugs from the U.S. ) would completely mess up the pharmaceutical business, which would especially suck for my family. He thought we could get it cheaper from Canada, but if we did that, then our pharmaceutical businesses would raise the prices when selling to Canada which would raise the prices of Canada selling back to us which would be ridiculous!

If I had to choose between re-electing Bush or electing Kerry, I’d vote Bush. The only reason so many people hate him is from the stories and editorials you hear on the news or read in the newspaper.

I don’t have many facts or anything to back up my story, but common, would you rather have Kerry as president?

Read full topic

item.title: What is your opinion on George W. Bush?
item.dc:creator: @Ron Ron
item.description:
@Ron wrote:

footballplayar34:

i agreed with everything you said ron and the retroactive law is going to suck. where did you heere about that though

I read the news. The ‘controlled’ news never said a word about it. The republicans are obviously conspiring to keep the population of the US ignorant to prevent mass strikes/riots or whatever.

bullzeye:

Yea what’s up with that retroactive law? But let me just say that everybody I know that’s a soldier wants to fight there because they say they’re achieveving something.

Just like when the soldiers forced the poor, imprisoned Iraqis into sexual poses and then took pictures of them. Oh yeah, achieving a lot there. :rolleyes: I get your point though, they want a feeling of achievement even though they are not helping at all.

item.source: What is your opinion on George W. Bush?

item.title: What is your opinion on George W. Bush?
item.dc:creator: @Ron Ron
item.description:
@Ron wrote:

solemage2:

why is he so bad?

Off the top of my head…

  • Got rich off the iraq war since his whole family is in oil and oil prices skyrocketed so he made a killing.

  • 3000 - 3500 US soldiers killed and over 100,000 Iraqis. Think how you would feel if you brother got shot or something, wouldn’t you hate the US? Well that’s what happening, and that happened 100,000 times. We have just created over 500,000 terrorists since the average Iraqi families have contain 5 people.

  • Increased the national deficit (the national debt which is over 5 trillion now). This was going down in Bill Clinton’s era and as soon as Bush came in, he fucked it all up and we owe so many countries money now. If we put all the money that went to the Iraq war, into colleges. We would all have FREE colleges and our communities would be flooded with doctors, lawyers, and other good professions. Instead, Americans died so ol’ bushy could make another billion.

  • He created the “Patriot Act” which basically let Bush do whatever the fuck he wants.

  • He recently (in the last week or 2) created a new act that lets the American Soldiers do whatever the fuck they want with prisoners which blatantly goes against the Geneva Convention. Bush has no morals at all!

  • Him and the Republicans devils created a new document which enabled RETROACTIVE laws! This is the WORST THING EVER! Let me explain. Retroactive laws are laws that will get you in trouble that haven’t even been made yet. Such as… If you stole a TV set and you went to jail for 5 years, and they made a law 50 years later saying anyone that steals will be a felony and not a misdemeanor, then you would go to jail for an ADITIONAL amount of years. Also… you could do something perfectly legal, and then they could make it illegal 50 years later, and then when you were 70 you would go to jail for it. Does that even make fucking sense?? So lets see… I should somehow go to the future, understand all the new retroactive laws, just so I could come back to the present and not get fucked.

  • Recorded all phone conversations. To George Bush, the Constitution is nothing but Toilet paper, because Bush has shat on it so many times, he just doesn’t care.

  • People protested outside of his ranch which is prefectly legal, and he created a new law that would send people to jail if they did that. Where is the freedom of speech??? Before you could protest any where as long as it was non violent. It’s like I just woke up one morning and I saw the Nazi Party walking all over the US. WHAT THE FUCK. Didn’t we fight a war against fascism? Aren’t we ‘anti communist’??

When Hugo Chavez (president of Venezuela) walked into the UN building and called Bush “the Devil” I totally agreed with him. I can’t fuckin believe the people of this nation voted him in after all the shit he pulled!

The above is just the things at the top of my head. There are so many other things he has done that the Average Joe Blow American doesn’t even realize.

Read full topic
item.source: What is your opinion on George W. Bush?
